intro: Psychotria micromyrtus, commonly known as the small-leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. The plant is noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
